TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DrawToolTipEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件由引发类时绘制和属性值是`true`。The event is raised by the class when the is drawn and the property value is `true`. 此事件的处理程序接收类型的参数。The handler for this event receives a parameter of type . 类包含绘制所需的所有信息，包括文本， ，和对象上完成绘制。The class contains all the information needed to paint the , including the text, the , and the object on which the drawing should be done. 若要自定义工具提示的外观，使用来确定的工具提示，边界和对象来执行自定义的绘制。To customize the look of the ToolTip, use the to determine the bounds of the ToolTip, and the object to perform your customized drawing. 你可以增加的边界显示通过处理之前事件。You can increase the bounds of the before it is shown by handling the event. 此外支持通过的部分自定义，和方法。 also supports partial customization through the , and methods. 使用这些方法，你可以所有者绘图部分的工具提示时，如果将以标准方式绘制的其他部分。Using these methods, you can owner draw portions of the ToolTip while leaving the other portions drawn in the standard way. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义绘图。The following code example demonstrates how to custom draw the . 该示例创建并将其关联到三个控件位于。The example creates a and associates it to three controls located on the . 该示例设置属性为 true，句柄事件。The example sets the property to true and handles the event. 在事件处理程序，是自定义，具体取决于假设按钮以不同的方式绘制所述为其显示的属性。In the event handler, the is custom drawn differently depending on what button the is being displayed for as indicated by the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为可能与通过多个控件方法，属性可以用于确定哪些控件与关联事件。Because the can be associated with multiple controls through the method, the property can be used to determine which control the event is associated with. 这是你想要执行不同的工具提示自定义基于关联控件的情况下非常有用。This is helpful if you want to perform different ToolTip customization based on the associated control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义绘图。The following code example demonstrates how to custom draw the . 该示例创建并将其关联到三个控件位于。The example creates a and associates it to three controls located on the . 该示例设置属性`true`并处理事件。The example sets the property to `true` and handles the event. 在事件处理程序，是自定义，具体取决于假设按钮以不同的方式绘制所述为其显示的属性。In the event handler, the is custom drawn differently depending on what button the is being displayed for as indicated by the property. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example excerpt demonstrates how to use the property. 请参阅完整的代码示例的类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. summary.span: 获取此 要绑定到的窗口。

span.span: Gets the window to which this is bound.
The window which owns the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当一个窗口拥有的另一个窗口时，拥有的窗口最小化，并关闭与所有者窗口。When a window is owned by another window, the owned window is minimized and closed with the owner window. 拥有的 windows 也不被显示在其所有者窗体后面。Owned windows are also never displayed behind their owner form. 此处将工具提示归由表示的本机 Win32 窗口属性。Here the ToolTip is owned by the native Win32 window represented by the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ToolTip1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolTip1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 使用系统文本颜色和字体绘制 的文本。

span.span: Draws the text of the using the system text color and font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法表示显示的默认方法。The method represents the default method of displaying a . 此方法使用的当前值和系统指定的字体字体颜色。This method uses the system specified font and the current value of for the font color. 作为单独的一行水平和垂直居中由指定的矩形中绘制文本属性; 它等效于对重载版本的以下调用:The text is drawn as a single line centered horizontally and vertically within the rectangle specified by the property; it is equivalent to the following call to the overloaded version of : `DrawText(TextFormatFlags.HorizontalCenter | TextFormatFlags.VerticalCenter | TextFormatFlags.SingleLine | TextFormatFlags.HidePrefix)` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义绘图。The following code example demonstrates how to custom draw the . 该示例创建并将其关联到三个控件位于。The example creates a and associates it to three controls located on the . 该示例设置属性为 true，句柄事件。The example sets the property to true and handles the event. 在事件处理程序，是自定义，具体取决于假设按钮以不同的方式绘制所述为其显示的属性。In the event handler, the is custom drawn differently depending on what button the is being displayed for as indicated by the property. 下面的代码演示如何使用， ，和方法。The code excerpt below demonstrates using the , , and methods. 请参阅完整的代码示例的类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. summary.span: 获取用于绘制 的图形图面。

span.span: Gets the graphics surface used to draw the .
The on which to draw the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你使用对象自定义的某些 visual 方面的绘制。You use the object to customize the drawing of certain visual aspects of a . 例如，您可以通过使用绘制工具提示背景方法。For example, you can draw your own ToolTip background by using the method. 任何自定义绘制都由指定的矩形外部完成属性将不会显示。Any custom drawing that is done outside of the rectangle specified by the property will not show up. 你可以增加的边界显示通过处理之前`ToolTip.Popup`事件。You can increase the bounds of the before it is shown by handling the `ToolTip.Popup` event. 类还提供了，和方法绘制的各个部分中由操作系统使用的标准方式。The class also provides the , and methods to draw individual parts of the in the standard way used by the operating system. 你可以使用这些方法，连同对象方法，使你的工具提示的某些部分标准，而自定义其他部分。You can use these methods, together with the object methods, to make some parts of your ToolTip standard, while customizing other parts. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义绘图。The following code example demonstrates how to custom draw the . 该示例创建并将其关联到三个控件位于。The example creates a and associates it to three controls located on the . 该示例设置属性为 true，句柄事件。The example sets the property to true and handles the event. 在事件处理程序，是自定义，具体取决于假设按钮以不同的方式绘制所述为其显示的属性。In the event handler, the is custom drawn differently depending on what button the is being displayed for as indicated by the property. 下面的代码演示如何使用和方法和使用属性。The code excerpt below demonstrates using the and methods and using the property. 请参阅完整的代码示例的类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. summary.span: 获取正在绘制的 的文本。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常使用属性来确定的工具提示文本则在您自定义绘图工具提示。Typically you would use the property to determine what the ToolTip text is when you are custom drawing your ToolTip. 你可以使用方法以自定义工具提示文本的绘制。You can use the method to customize the drawing of the ToolTip text. 如果你想要具有样式，请使用的工具提示文本绘制使用指定的系统方法。If you want to have the ToolTip text drawn using the system specified style, use the method. 文本值来自于传递给值方法类。The text value comes from the value passed to the method of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义绘图。The following code example demonstrates how to custom draw the . 该示例创建并将其关联到三个控件位于。The example creates a and associates it to three controls located on the . 该示例设置属性为 true，句柄事件。The example sets the property to true and handles the event. 在事件处理程序，是自定义，具体取决于假设按钮以不同的方式绘制所述为其显示的属性。In the event handler, the is custom drawn differently depending on what button the is being displayed for as indicated by the property. 下面的代码演示如何使用方法和使用， ，和属性。The code excerpt below demonstrates using the method and using the , , and properties. 请参阅完整的代码示例的类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw/VB/form1.vb#3)]
